比.definition: to compare; (followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}; ratio; to gesture; (Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

比一比.definition: to make a comparison; to engage in a contest

比上不足，比下有餘.pinyin: bi3 shang4 - bu4 zu2 , bi3 xia4 - you3 yu2
比上不足，比下有餘.definition: neither the best nor the worst; not too bad; better than some

比下去.definition: to defeat; to be superior to

比不了.definition: cannot compare to; to be no match for

比亞.definition: Bia, daughter of Pallas and Styx in Greek mythology, personification of violence

比亞韋斯托克.pinyin: Bi3 ya4 wei2 si1 tuo1 ke4

比作.definition: to liken to; to compare to

比做.definition: to liken to; to compare to

比價.definition: to compare prices; to compare offers; price ratio; price parity; rate of exchange

比利.definition: (HK, Sg, Tw) Pelé (1940-2022), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star

比劃.definition: to gesture; to gesticulate; to practice the moves of a martial art by imitating the teacher; to fight; to come to blows

比及.definition: (literary) when; by the time; Taiwan pr. [bi4 ji2]

比喻.definition: to compare; to liken to; metaphor; analogy; figure of speech; figuratively

比基尼島.definition: Bikini atoll, French nuclear test site in South Pacific

比如.definition: for example; for instance; such as

比年.definition: (literary) every year; year after year; (literary) in recent years; Taiwan pr. [bi4 nian2]

比心.definition: (Internet slang) to form a hand heart using one's thumb and forefinger (or by using both hands)

比手劃腳.definition: to gesticulate; to make lively gestures (while talking); also written 比手畫腳|比手画脚

比手畫腳.definition: to gesticulate; to make lively gestures (while talking); also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚

比捕.definition: (old) to set a time limit for the arrest of a criminal; Taiwan pr. [bi4 bu3]

比擬.definition: to compare; to draw a parallel; to match; analogy; metaphor; comparison

比武.definition: martial arts competition; tournament; to compete in a contest

比氏鶲鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Bianchi's warbler (Phylloscopus valentini)

比為.definition: to liken to; to compare to

比照.definition: according to; in the light of; contrast

比爛.definition: to compare two unsatisfactory things; to argue that others have similar or worse faults (as a response to criticism); whataboutery

比爾博.definition: Bilbo Baggins, hero of Tolkien's The Hobbit 霍比特人

比畫.definition: variant of 比劃|比划[bi3 hua5]

比登天還難.definition: lit. even harder than reaching the sky (idiom); fig. extremely difficult; far from an easy task

比翼雙飛.definition: lit. a pair of birds flying close together (idiom); fig. two hearts beating as one; name of a sweet and sour chicken wing dish

比翼齊飛.definition: to fly wing to wing (idiom); two hearts beating as one; (of a couple) inseparable

比耶.definition: to make a V sign (esp. when posing for photos)

比肩.definition: to be shoulder to shoulder; (fig.) to be as good as; to match; Taiwan pr. [bi4 jian1]

比試.definition: to have a competition; to measure with one's hand or arm; to make a gesture of measuring

比賽.definition: competition (sports etc); match; CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]; to compete

比賽場.definition: stadium; playing field for a competition

比賽項目.definition: sporting event; item on program of sports competition

比較.definition: to compare; to contrast; comparatively; relatively; quite; comparison

比鄰.definition: (literary) next-door neighbor; near; next to; Taiwan pr. [bi4lin2]

比量.definition: to measure roughly (with the hand, a stick, string etc)
